column4: Hello, I am  trying to install Ubuntu alongside Windows 7. I tried the Wubi Windows Installer and that would not boot when I selected it from the boot menu. So, I tried downloading the iso file and burning it to a DVD. When I restarted my computer to try and install it no boot menu came up; it just went straight to Windows 7. So I restarted again and pressed F12, chose "boot from disc" option,
but there was no OS selection menu; it just went straight to Windows 7.
both work, make sure you check the md5sum of the ISO and use unetbootin to load the thumb.
